keyPolicies.policyDescription: Strongly opposes the Tory plan to cut school budgets by 10%.
Very concerned about the future of the NHS, believes it should remain in public hands and free to everyone who needs it.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Letting the right wing Tory win in this constituency increases the chance that those cuts to local school budgets will go ahead.

issues.education: Opposes Tory plan to cut school budgets by 10%.
issues.health: Believes the NHS should remain in public hands, free to everyone who needs it.

politicalExperience.achievements: Became involved in politics to make sure that every child has a fair chance to get on in life.

images.caption: A big thank you for the very positive response we have had as we have been out and about talking to local residents recently.
